sections.title: AI Trading Assistant
sections.summary: Conversational AI for market analysis and trading automation.

items.label: Chat Interface
items.description: Ask the AI assistant about market conditions, portfolio analysis, risk assessment, and trading strategies. Conversations maintain context across multiple turns and include reasoning traces to explain recommendations.

items.label: Quick Actions
items.description: Create automated trading rules like 'Buy SOL when price drops 5%' or 'Sell if risk score exceeds 75'. The AI monitors market conditions 24/7 and executes actions when conditions are met.

items.label: Portfolio Optimization
items.description: Request AI-powered portfolio optimization suggestions based on Modern Portfolio Theory. Get specific buy/sell recommendations with expected return and risk metrics.

items.label: Pattern Recognition
items.description: Real-time detection of market patterns including pump-and-dump schemes, whale accumulation, liquidity drain risks, and other anomalies. Receive severity-based alerts with actionable recommendations.

items.label: Command Types
items.description: Use specialized commands for focused analysis: Risk Analysis, Market Analysis, Trade Suggestions, Pattern Recognition, Portfolio Optimization, and Quick Action creation. Each command type optimizes the AI's response for that specific task.

items.label: Feedback System
items.description: Rate AI responses with thumbs up/down and provide comments. Your feedback helps improve the AI's accuracy and relevance over time through reinforcement learning.
